biographyData.title: Biography
biographyData.bio: Justin McClain is a software engineer at Progressive Insurance, specializing in C# for web APIs and desktop applications. He holds a bachelor's degree from Indiana Tech. Outside of work, Justin enjoys beach vacations with his family and their beloved dog. He is an avid reader and writer of fiction, and continually explores new advancements in technology.

interestsData.title: Justin's Current Interests
interestsData.tagline: Currently I am learning front end technologies in my Web Application Development course at BU. But what has my attention lately are different AI integration methodologies or algorithms.
